PerfectNetExp.abs: 介绍虎鲸属（orcinus）(Orcinus) 是鲸目海豚科（Class Delphinidae）的一属。只有虎鲸一种，虎鲸又称为杀人鲸、逆戟鲸，是海豚科中体型最大 …
逆戟鲸属(Orcinus)是一个具有悠久历史的真海豚科家族 , 在意大利及日本上新世地层都发现过许多逆戟鲸属(Orcinus)的牙齿 , 在新西兰.

auth_sentence.content: The species is correctly known as an Orcinus orca.

auth_sentence.content: The apex carnivore Orcinus orca, the killer whale, began preying on sea otters, reducing their numbers significantly.
